thread.title: Restoring Our Faith In Love: Naseeruddin Shah And Ratna Pathak
thread.title_full: Restoring Our Faith In Love: Naseeruddin Shah And Ratna Pathak

title: Restoring Our Faith In Love: Naseeruddin Shah And Ratna Pathak
text:
facebook Ratna Pathak who met Naseeruddin Shah during rehearsals of a theatre play, once mentioned, “ One day we were not even friends; the next day we were going out together." The society had issues- religion, age and more- but these two didn’t care. This is one couple we admire for, not just their sweet love story, but also their liberal thoughts and bold statements. “ We are the last of the bloody liberals left..” Ratna said in an interview once and we honestly can’t deny! A post shared by Prabhat Shetty (@prabhatshetty) on Jan 17, 2017 at 6:03am PST 
)
